description:
****Course Updated June 2016****

Welcome to this amazing course: The Complete Ruby Programming Course. Ruby is a powerful, flexible programming language,and it 's famous for being easy to learn. but most users only scratch the surface of what it can do.This course is an introduction to computer programming. It will be taught using Ruby, a modern object-oriented programming language that is hailed for being simple, yet powerful. But someone who has worked for years as a professional programmer and hired dozens of coders myself, understanding the basics is critical.This course will give you a solid foundation to start programming for fun or for use in your career.

This course is designed to make it easy for everyone to master Ruby.It has been divided into following main sections:

  • Programming Basics
  • Object-Oriented Programming
  • Ruby Standard Library
  • Gems

This course will help you quickly master all the difficult concepts and the learning will be a breeze.

Let's get started.
title: The Complete Ruby Programming Course: Become a Ruby Master
